default.shortDescription: Start an automation with a click of a button.
descriptionParagraphs: Start an automation with a click of a button. You can automate for repetitive tasks from your Desktop or Mobile devices. For example, instantly send a reminder to the team with a push of a button from your mobile device.

mediaAssets.alt: Instant flow in business process flow | 2020 release wave 1 overview

items.name: Create a button flow
items.description: There are many repetitive tasks that we all wish we could run with just a tap of a button.

items.name: Create a flow from your phone
items.description: Create a cloud flow from your phone by using a Power Automate template.

items.name: Get started with button trigger tokens
items.description: Button trigger tokens are data points that are known and available to the device on which a button flow is running.

items.name: Introducing button flows with user input
items.description: Create a button flow to run routine tasks by simply tapping a button. Customize your flow by allowing the user to provide specific details that will be used when the flow runs.

items.name: Share button flows in Power Automate
items.description: In the Power Automate mobile app, you can share button flows (buttons) with other users or groups within your organization.
